San_Clemente.Our Savior's Lutheran School (California:
Our Savior's Lutheran School is a private preschool and elementary school, located in San Clemente, California, United States. It was founded in 1956.


== Academics ==
The school was awarded the National Blue Ribbon School of excellence by the U.S. Department of Education in 2004, an award that only private schools scoring in the top 10% receive.
